mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.permission FROM user_role ur LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0

SELECT r.role_id as roleId , r.role_name as roleName, m.menu_id as menuId, m.menu_name as menuName, m.permission FROM role_menu rm LEFT JOIN role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE r.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY roleId

SELECT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.permission, m.del_flag, m.version FROM role_menu rm LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE r.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.del_flag = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0
